abstract: A longtime member of the board, Arthur D. Levinson, will become its leader. Apple also named Robert A. Iger, the chief executive of Disney, as a director.
snippet: A longtime member of the board, Arthur D. Levinson, will become its leader. Apple also named Robert A. Iger, the chief executive of Disney, as a director.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Apple on Tuesday named a new board chairman, in another signal that the technology giant would not be run the same way as it was under its co-founder, Steven P. Jobs.

headline.main: Apple Appoints New Chairman and Elects Disney’s Chief to Board
headline.print_headline: Apple Appoints New Chairman and Elects Disney’s Chief to Board
